item.title: Using Nitrokey Pro and Fido2
item.description: In order to store and protect my credentials and to simplify 2 Factor authentication I’ve bought some USB keys from Nitrokey. While it may be possible to find more complete or fancy solutions I selected Nitrokey, a German company, as both hardware and software is Open Source and I trust this way more than a black box provided by a company that is asking to get some blind trust. For storing and protecting GPG or S/MIME key I’ve choosed a Nitrokey Pro 2 USB key.
